attributes.action: Increase pay for all key workers: this includes nurses and cleaners in the NHS!!
attributes.additional_details:
Deserve more respect and gratitude from the British government and public. 

Clapping 👏 is not enough! Bring real change and support our key workers.

Without them, many patients lives would be at risk! 

Many key workers have had to make sacrifices such as being separated from families during this crisis. The nhs has battled covid 19 not the government.

You can’t have unclean hospital for sick patients/workers! Cleaners are as valuable and put themselves at risk daily!!
attributes.background: Raise the wages for all NHS key workers, including cleaners and nurses. Simple, don’t mess around with our key workers.
